entry.title: Pulse Fitness App
entry.content:
The Challenge

Pulse Health wanted to create a fitness app that stood out in a crowded market. Their differentiator: a social accountability system where friends could set shared goals and track progress together.

Our Approach

We worked in two-week sprints with continuous user testing. The tech stack was chosen for maximum code reuse across platforms:

// Shared core logic between iOS and Android
interface WorkoutSession {
  id: string;
  userId: string;
  exercises: Exercise[];
  startedAt: Date;
  completedAt?: Date;
  sharedWith: string[];
}

function calculateProgress(
  sessions: WorkoutSession[],
  goal: WeeklyGoal
): ProgressReport {
  const completed = sessions.filter(s => s.completedAt);
  return {
    total: completed.length,
    target: goal.sessionsPerWeek,
    percentage: Math.round((completed.length / goal.sessionsPerWeek) * 100),
  };
}

Key Features

  • Social goals: Invite friends to shared fitness challenges
  • Smart scheduling: AI-powered workout recommendations based on recovery status
  • Progress visualization: Charts and streaks to maintain motivation
  • Offline mode: Full functionality without internet connection

The Result

The app launched on both iOS and Android simultaneously. Within the first month, the social features drove a 3x higher retention rate compared to industry benchmarks.

entry.title: Solaris Brand Redesign
entry.content:
The Challenge

Solaris Energy had outgrown their original identity. As they expanded from a local installer to a national provider, they needed a brand that communicated scale, trust, and innovation.

Our Approach

We started with stakeholder interviews and competitive analysis, then developed three distinct creative directions. The winning concept centered on a dynamic sun motif that works across digital and print.

Deliverables

  • Primary and secondary logo system
  • Color palette with accessibility-tested contrast ratios
  • Typography system (headings + body)
  • Brand guidelines document (48 pages)
  • Marketing website redesign

The Result

The new identity launched across all touchpoints within 8 weeks. Early feedback from the sales team indicated improved prospect engagement and brand recognition.

{{< testimonial name="Sarah Chen" role="CEO, Solaris Energy" quote="Studio didn't just give us a new logo — they gave us a brand that tells our story. The response from our customers and partners has been overwhelmingly positive." >}}

The rebrand coincided with a 40% increase in qualified inbound leads over the following quarter.
